mapper.sql: tk_plan_id, tk_plan_user_id, tk_plan_user_name, tk_client_type_id, tk_plan_loc_id, tk_plan_time, tk_plan_target, tk_plan_state,tk_plan_name
mapper.select: select tk_plan_state as tkPlanState,tk_plan_time as tkPlanTime,tk_plan_name as tkPlanName,tk_plan_id as tkPlanId from tk_plan where tk_plan_user_id = #{tkUserId}

select tk_user_id,tk_user_name,tk_user_phone,tk_user_head,tk_client_amount from tk_user where tk_User_id in(SELECT tk_user_grade_id FROM `tk_user_grade` where `tk_user_grade_pid` = #{tkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by tk_client_amount desc limit 0,3

select tk_user_id,tk_user_name,tk_user_phone,tk_user_head,tk_client_amount from tk_user where tk_user_id not in (select tk_user_id from( select tk_user_id from tk_user where tk_User_id in(SELECT tk_user_grade_id FROM `tk_user_grade` where `tk_user_grade_pid` = #{tkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by tk_client_amount desc limit 0,3 )as t)
mapper.insert: insert into tk_plan (tk_plan_id, tk_plan_user_id, tk_plan_user_name, tk_client_type_id, tk_plan_loc_id, tk_plan_time, tk_plan_target, tk_plan_state) values (#{tkPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tkPlanUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tkPlanUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tkClientTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tkPlanLocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tkPlanTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tkPlanTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tkPlanState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tk_plan
tk_plan_user_id = #{tkPlanUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tk_plan_user_name = #{tkPlanUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tk_client_type_id = #{tkClientTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tk_plan_loc_id = #{tkPlanLocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tk_plan_time = #{tkPlanTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tk_plan_target = #{tkPlanTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tk_plan_state = #{tkPlanState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tk_plan_id = #{tkPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tk_plan set tk_plan_user_id = #{tkPlanUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tk_plan_user_name = #{tkPlanUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tk_client_type_id = #{tkClientTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tk_plan_loc_id = #{tkPlanLocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tk_plan_time = #{tkPlanTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tk_plan_target = #{tkPlanTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tk_plan_state = #{tkPlanState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tk_plan_id = #{tkPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from tk_plan where tk_plan.tk_plan_id in ( select tk_punchcard_feedback_plan_id from tk_punchcard_feedback where tk_punchcard_feedback_user_id=#{tkUserId})
